member.name: T:Prototype1v1.HintingAsset
member.summary: An asset that provides hints to the players.

member.name: M:Prototype1v1.HintingAsset.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MyAsset class.

member.name: P:Prototype1v1.HintingAsset.Settings
member.summary: Gets or sets options for controlling the operation.
member.remarks: Besides the toXml() and fromXml() methods, we never use this property but use it's correctly typed backing field 'settings' instead.
This property should go into each asset having Settings of its own.
The actual class used should be derived from BaseSettings (and not directly from ISetting).

member.name: T:Prototype1v1.MyAssetSettings
member.summary:
An asset settings.
BaseSettings contains the (de-)serialization methods.

member.name: M:Prototype1v1.MyAssetSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MyAssetSettings class.

member.name: P:Prototype1v1.MyAssetSettings.TestProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the test property.

member.name: P:Prototype1v1.MyAssetSettings.TestReadOnly
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the test read only.
member.value: true if test read only, false if not.
